name: @groww-tech/tsconfig
description: Shared TypeScript config for Groww projects

scripts.pushTags: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag -a tsconfig-v$PACKAGE_VERSION -m "@groww-tech/tsconfig-v$PACKAGE_VERSION" && git push --tags

author: Rishabh Tripathi <ristripathi97@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/ristripathi)
